item.title: IA and ONE’s Free 6th Anniversary Super LIVESHOW!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
Recently announced via 1st PLACE Co. Ltd., IA and ONE’s anniversary show will be aired this coming week! In celebration of their 6th anniversary event, there will be a wonderful mix of both a live performance and a talk show! Things to look out for include some major news – including IA and ONE’s “CeVIO …

The post IA and ONE’s Free 6th Anniversary Super LIVESHOW! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Recently announced via 1st PLACE Co. Ltd., IA and ONE’s anniversary show will be aired this coming week! In celebration of their 6th anniversary event, there will be a wonderful mix of both a live performance and a talk show!

Things to look out for include some major news – including IA and ONE’s “CeVIO AI” software news release, live performances of brand new songs by both IA and ONE, and previews of a new VR live stage that is currently being under construction…

Details

Program: IA 9th & ONE 6th Anniversary -Super Liveshow-
Date: January 27, 2021 (Wednesday) – Open 19:45 / Start 20:00 (program to be archived)
Fee: Free!
Channel: To be hosted on Youtube [IA & ONE Official Virtual Broadcast] on the day
Appearences: IA / ONE / Staff G

The post IA and ONE’s Free 6th Anniversary Super LIVESHOW! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA’s MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” OST Available For Pre-Order!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
In an announcement made on IA’s official Facebook page, 1st Place has revealed that the pre-orders for the MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK have opened for all fans worldwide! This new soundtrack features 21 high quality songs and 5 new vocal tracks. This CD was sold at exclusive events in Japan and overseas, …

The post IA’s MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” OST Available For Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In an announcement made on IA’s official Facebook page, 1st Place has revealed that the pre-orders for the MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK have opened for all fans worldwide!

This new soundtrack features 21 high quality songs and 5 new vocal tracks. This CD was sold at exclusive events in Japan and overseas, making it a very sought after piece among fans. It includes multiple messages recorded by IA too!

In this amazing soundtrack you’ll be able to recognize multiple popular producers from the scene such as Shinichi Osawa (MONDO GROSSO), TeddyLoid, ANANT-GARDE EYES, Ishifuro, and DJ DANTZ.

Fans that place their pre-orders through Tokyo Otaku Mode or CD Japan will obtain a one-of-a-kind free item. If you also pre-order through Tokyo Otaku Mode, you’ll receive a special set of badges, while those that do it through CD Japan will receive an acrylic keychain.

Product Information

Artist: IA
Title: MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK (Featuring 21 songs)
Release Date: March 18, 2020
Digital Release Date: March 18, 2020 (Available in multiple streaming services worldwide)
Price: 3,500 yen (excluding tax)

Tracklist

  • Introduction ～Planet ARIA～
  • ARIA’s Breath
  • Dawn of the Planet ARIA
  • HAVE FUN!
  • Discord
  • The National Anthem Of ARIA
  • One Heart
  • Resonance World ～Inner Journey～
  • LIFE LOVE PEACE
  • PARTY A GO-GO
  • Conqueror
  • 絶対領域
  • ホロンボット feat. IA (ARIA Ver.)
  • Reload
  • 夜咄ディセイブ -TeddyLoid Hopping Remix-
  • てるみい (Live Version)
  • Euphoria (Live Version)
  • Resonance World
  • The Eternity And More
  • Higher
  • ARIA ON THE PLANETES ～Best wishes for you～

Pre-Order Information

You can pre-order this amazing soundtrack from the following websites:

CD JAPAN (Click Me)

Tokyo Otaku Mode (Click Me)

Note: Available for international shipping only.

Sources

IA Official World Page on Facebook

The post IA’s MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” OST Available For Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA 8th and ONE 5th Anniversary Virtual Broadcast Roundup
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
As IA’s 8th and ONE’s 5th Anniversary virtual broadcast has come to an end, we have a roundup of all the announcements for those who may have missed it! Groove Coaster First up, it was announced that IA and ONE songs are being added to Groove Coaster Wai Wai Party on Switch! The songs included …

The post IA 8th and ONE 5th Anniversary Virtual Broadcast Roundup appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
As IA’s 8th and ONE’s 5th Anniversary virtual broadcast has come to an end, we have a roundup of all the announcements for those who may have missed it!

Groove Coaster

First up, it was announced that IA and ONE songs are being added to Groove Coaster Wai Wai Party on Switch!

The songs included are:

  • Yobanashi Deceive
  • Circuit Disco
  • Over Drive
  • Perverse Love Rock!
  • Into Starlight
  • Reload
  • Tell Me
  • Mirai
  • Conqueror
  • And one more secret song!

You can find out more about Groove Coaster on the official website here.

ARIA -Musical & Live Show- Blu-Ray

Another exciting announcement, the ARIA -Musical & Live Show- performance, that was held at DMM VR Theater Yokohama last year, shall be released on Blu-Ray this Spring!

The final release date will be announced later so keep an eye out for updates!

New Merchandise

As we have come to expect from the IA and ONE anniversaries, there has been new merchandise added to the 1st Place Official shop, Hachimaki, featuring the latest anniversary artwork!

This year, the new items include:

  • IA 8th Anniversary Special Figure – 31, 800 JPY
  • ONE 5th Anniversary Special Figure – 31, 800 JPY
  • Acrylic Panel – 4,800 JPY
  • Portable Charger – 3,800 JPY
  • Acrylic Keychain Set – 1,000 JPY
  • Clear Files – 600 JPY

Please note that you will need a proxy to order from outside of Japan.

From January 27th to February 16th, you can also receive bonus items when you buy IA and ONE merchandise from the Hachimaki shop, depending on how much you spent!

If you purchase over 5000 JPY, you shall also receive a bonus shopper bag, while spending over 10,000 JPY you will also get another shopper bag in addition of a special IA & ONE Voice CD titled “ON THE PLANETES”!

There is also a sale on at the Hachimaki shop until February 61th, with goods from 30% to 70% off, so this is a good time to buy your favorite character’s goods!

Illustration Recruitment Campaign

An illustration recruitment project has also been announced!

In this campaign, 1st Place is actually looking for illustrations, stories, comics and picture books based on the theme of ‘A Story of a Certain Planet’ and the robot illustrations featured in the anniversary artwork this year.

The works which are selected from the submissions will be compiled together in a collection at a later date!

Submission Guidelines

  • Illustrations, comics and picture books: Format must be psd, jpg or png format. 350 dpi is recommended for printing purposes.
  • Written works: Word documents are the preferred format.

There is no size limit mentioned for either format.

The deadline for this campaign is February 28th, at 18:00 JST.

How to apply

In order to submit your entries, send an email with your illustration attached (or a link to it, if the file is too large to attach) to robot@1stplace.co.jp and the following subject: “2020年 IA&ONE アニバーサリーイラスト企画係“.

MG Camp

In 2020, a holographic exhibition will be held at MG Camp, featuring IA and ONE!

MG Camp is a show for advanced and innovative creative technology, mainly focusing on 3D CG and holograms

The date for the exhibition has not yet been announced but look forward to the announcement in Spring, 2020!

Nagoya Anige Fes

Additionally, there will be IA and ONE merchandise sold at ‘Anige Fes 2020 in Nagoya’, which will be held from February 15th to 16th in Port Messe, Nagoya.

You can find out more about the event on the official website here.

Diamond Days – IA and ONE 2020 Version

Finally, here is the anniversary song for this year, a new version of Diamond Days, featuring both IA and ONE this time!

That’s it for this year but, as usual, stay tuned to VNN for further updates on all of the upcoming events and merchandise coming in 2020!

Happy Anniversary IA and ONE!

Sources

1st Place Official Blog

1st Place Website

The post IA 8th and ONE 5th Anniversary Virtual Broadcast Roundup appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA 8th and ONE 5th Anniversary Virtual Broadcast on January 27th!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
IA and ONE‘s anniversary is less than a week away and, as is tradition, 1st Place will be holding a virtual broadcast on January 27th to celebrate IA’s 8th and ONE’s 5th anniversary! As you may have already seen, the promotional artwork for this year features IA and ONE with cool plugsuit style outfits and …

The post IA 8th and ONE 5th Anniversary Virtual Broadcast on January 27th! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
IA and ONE‘s anniversary is less than a week away and, as is tradition, 1st Place will be holding a virtual broadcast on January 27th to celebrate IA’s 8th and ONE’s 5th anniversary!

As you may have already seen, the promotional artwork for this year features IA and ONE with cool plugsuit style outfits and matching mechas!

What will be in the broadcast?

The broadcast shall contain a recap of key events held in 2019, such as IA’s Party A Go-Go Super Edition, the Aria Musical & Live Show, the J-Wave Innovation World Fiesta 2019 and the 1st Place 15th Anniversary Live event.

There will also be a remix of Conqueror by DJ DANTZ, the announcement of the 2020 Anniversary song and much more!

IA, ONE and Clerk G are listed as performers in the broadcast, so look forward to seeing them there!

Where can I watch the broadcast?

The virtual broadcast will be streamed live on the IA and ONE Official YouTube channel here.

When is the broadcast?

The broadcast shall start on January 27th at 7:30 PM JST, so be sure to check your local time zone and mark your calendar to make sure you don’t miss it!

Source

1st Place Official News Blog

IA and ONE Official YouTube Channel

The post IA 8th and ONE 5th Anniversary Virtual Broadcast on January 27th! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: ARIA Debuts at Anime Weekend Atlanta
item.dc:creator: khanadee
item.description:
This past weekend, I was one of the many VOCALOID fans to attend Anime Weekend Atlanta. At long last, 1st Place debuts ARIA; a story of life, love and peace. I won’t be sharing too much information on the contents for those that want to experience it themselves without prior knowledge. There was a wonderful …

The post ARIA Debuts at Anime Weekend Atlanta appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
This past weekend, I was one of the many VOCALOID fans to attend Anime Weekend Atlanta. At long last, 1st Place debuts ARIA; a story of life, love and peace.

I won’t be sharing too much information on the contents for those that want to experience it themselves without prior knowledge. There was a wonderful story that continued from beginning to end, with lots of unexpected IA and ONE lore sprinkled in.

It’s very clear how much 1st Place cares for IA, ONE and their fans. The concert was fantastic from a visual, story and musical standpoints. Several new songs were created for the concert and I would highly recommend checking out the soundtrack when possible.

Another highlight was certainly the live dancers. There were some very complicated moves they pulled off that made the crowd go absolutely wild. The choreography was amazing and the dancers were spot on. The costumes were just as good; in particular, I loved the complexity of the first one.

What a beautiful concert! Thank you for coming to the U.S.! @IA_ONE_Official @1st_PLACE0302 pic.twitter.com/DYT4qOlBza

— haneoka (@Haneokaa) November 4, 2019

(Some people got to take pictures with IA, depending on what ticket they purchased. What a beautiful outfit!)

Outside the concert was a booth full of IA and ONE merchandise. I may or may not have spent at least $80 there, but it was totally worth it. At the booth was also an AR poster, where you could take a picture of IA and ONE!

Thank you, Anime Weekend Atlanta!!

IA
ONE/OИE
Staff#awacon #IA_ARIA pic.twitter.com/3Ppgtsrtzh

— IA&ONE公式 (@IA_ONE_Official) November 1, 2019

Please continue to support 1st Place and other companies, and request concerts like this or VOCAMERICA to come to a local convention near you! I look forward to seeing where ARIA and IA go next.

Sources

1st Place is on Twitter, as well as Facebook (and a global Facebook) and their own website.
Anime Weekend Atlanta has Twitter, Facebook and their own website.
Haneoka is on Twitter and DeviantArt.

The post ARIA Debuts at Anime Weekend Atlanta appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA and ONE concert screening at Tsukuba Conference next month!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
Fans of IA and ONE will be pleased to hear that there will be a concert screening next month at Tsukuba Conference! The screening shall be part of the opening ceremony for the 3rd day of the conference and will feature recordings of live performances from 2018 to 2019. What is Tsukuba Conference? The Tsukuba …

The post IA and ONE concert screening at Tsukuba Conference next month! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Fans of IA and ONE will be pleased to hear that there will be a concert screening next month at Tsukuba Conference! The screening shall be part of the opening ceremony for the 3rd day of the conference and will feature recordings of live performances from 2018 to 2019.

What is Tsukuba Conference?

The Tsukuba Conference is a 3 day conference, sponsored by the Tsukuba Conference Committee.

The event is focused on innovation in science and technology and how it contributes to society.

Please note that the 2nd and 3rd days of the event are by invitation only.

The 4th day is open to the public.

Where is the screening?

The location of the event is the Tsukuba International Conference Hall in Japan. The full address is:

Tsukuba International Conference Hall, 2-20-3 Takezono, Tsukuba, Ibaraki, Japan.

The concert screening will be held in the large hall of the venue.

When is the screening?

The conference will run from October 2nd to October 4th, 2019.

The IA and ONE concert screening will be held on Friday, 4th October.

The screening will start at 1:30 PM and end at 3:00 PM.

More Information

We at VNN are excited to hear about more concert screenings for IA and ONE!

Make sure you stay tuned to VNN for further announcements and keep an eye on IA and ONE’s official Twitter for updates straight from the ARIA girls!

Source

Tsukuba Conference website

The post IA and ONE concert screening at Tsukuba Conference next month! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA Live in Atlanta
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
On October 31st until November 3rd, “Anime Weekend Atlanta” will take place at the Renaissance Waverly & Cobb Galleria Center in Atlanta, Georgia. During that weekend, there will be a special guest! IA will be performing a live on October 31st, 2019 from 7:00 to 10:00 PM EDT.     Tickets Aria Crew Exclusive: This …

The post IA Live in Atlanta appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
On October 31st until November 3rd, “Anime Weekend Atlanta” will take place at the Renaissance Waverly & Cobb Galleria Center in Atlanta, Georgia. During that weekend, there will be a special guest! IA will be performing a live on October 31st, 2019 from 7:00 to 10:00 PM EDT.

 

 

Tickets

Aria Crew Exclusive: This pack includes several things such as a reserved seat, the ability to perform on stage with IA during the last song of the show, two photo shoots with IA, exclusive full graphic T-shirt, autograph of IA and ONE’s producer, credit as ARIA STAFF on the official website and an official supporter pass. ($1500 USD + $52.95 Fee).

Super VIP: Super VIP includes a center seat, group picture with IA and ONE, autograph of IA and ONE’s producer, exclusive full graphic T-shirt and an official supporter pass. ($500 USD + $22.95 Fee)

VIP: This package includes a special seat as well as an exclusive T-shirt. ($150 USD + $8.49 Fee)

General Entrance: $60 USD + $3.99 Fee

General Entrance Standing: $55 USD +$3.74 Fee

If you purchase your tickets the day of the show, ticket prices will be $65 USD + $4.24 fee for the general entrance. Ticket sales will end on October 31st.

Note: In order to attend the Aria concert, you will need a 4 day AWA membership or a Thursday membership on top of tickets. 

You can purchase your AWA tickets as well as the concert tickets at the link here!

 

Will you be attending? Let us know!

The post IA Live in Atlanta appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA Crowdfunding Campaign launching soon!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
1st Place has announced a crowdfunding campaign starting on 12th September! This campaign will help support and grow IA’s live performances, such as the Aria and Party A Go Go performances to be held on 30th November. Check out all the rewards on offer from the campaign and details of how to support it below. …

The post IA Crowdfunding Campaign launching soon! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
1st Place has announced a crowdfunding campaign starting on 12th September! This campaign will help support and grow IA’s live performances, such as the Aria and Party A Go Go performances to be held on 30th November.

Check out all the rewards on offer from the campaign and details of how to support it below.

Campaign Rewards

1st Place never disappoints! For this campaign you can pledge for a wide variety of rewards, from can badges and acylic stands to group photos and even the opportunity to co-star in the live performance! Each reward requires a certain amount of money to have been pledged so we have provided a summary of the different tiers of rewards and the various plans available.

< 2, 000 JPY

IA Supporter Plan

(No limited quantity)

  • A video message of thanks from IA to all supporters.
  • Access to live updates on the campaign.
  • Original smartphone screensaver.

2, 000 JPY

Can Badge Plan

(No limited quantity)

  • You may choose 1 large can badge from 3 designs, as seen below.
  • Previous rewards shall also be included.

6, 000 JPY

Acrylic Stand Plan

(No limited quantity)

  • You may choose 1 IA acrylic stand from 5 designs, as seen below.
  • Previous rewards shall also be included.

9, 000 JPY

T-Shirt Plan

(No limited quantity)

  • You shall receive 1 limited edition T-shirt.
  • Sizes available are S/M/L/XL/XXL.
  • Previous rewards shall also be included.

15, 000 JPY

Special Plan

(No limited quantity)

  • You will receive a supporter’s limited edition of the live brochure. (To be shipped January-February 2020.)
  • You will receive 1 set of IA photos, from 3 sets (both physical and digital).
  • Your name will be posted on the Aria special site.
  • Previous rewards shall also be included.

30, 000 JPY

Alarm Clock Plan

(Limited to 50)

  • You will receive a 10 second message from IA or ONE, addressed to a name of your choosing , which you can use as an alarm clock ringtone.
  • Previous rewards shall also be included.

40, 000 JPY

There are three different rewards in this price category so check out each of them below.

Personalised Thank You Message Plan

(Limited to 50)

  • A video message of thanks from either IA or ONE to you personally, which will include your name.
  • Previous rewards shall also be included.

Group Photo with IA – Party A Go Go

(Limited to 12)

  • A commemorative group photo will be taken on stage with IA at the Party A Go Go performance.
  • Photo will be delivered January-February 2020.
  • Please note that you must purchase tickets to the performance separately.

Group Photo with IA – Aria

(Limited to 12)

  • A commemorative group photo will be taken on stage with IA at the Aria performance.
  • Photo till be delivered January-February 2020.
  • Please note that you must purchase tickets to the performance separately.

80, 000 JPY

Illustration Plan

(Limited to 10)

  • You will receive a chibi-style A4 illustration, featuring yourself surrounded by IA and ONE.
  • Please note that the company shall require a photo of you to draw you as a chibi character for the illustration, which shall be requested by email at a later date.
  • The illustration shall be delivered in January-February 2020.

150, 000 JPY

Special Stage Co-star Plan

(Limited to 4)

  • You can co-star with IA and ONE on stage during the live performance.
  • You shall receive a commemorative photo of the performance. (To be delivered January-February 2020.)
  • You may also record video of the performance with smartphone or camera.
  • Your name shall be featured in the cast list for the performance.
  • You shall receive a certificate on the day of the performance.
  • Please note that you must purchase tickets to the performance separately.

How to Support the Campaign

To support the crowdfunding campaign, check out the campaign page here.

Please note that you will need to create a Muevo account before you can make a pledge and you will need a valid VISA or MasterCard credit card.

To sign up to Muevo, simply click here.

The campaign does not go live until 12th September but you can create a Muevo account in advance.

The campaign will run from 12th September at 20:00 to 10th November, 2019 at 23:59.

If you have any questions for the staff running the IA Crowdfunding campaign, you can submit your questions via the form here.

VNN shall be sure to post further updates on this campaign after it kicks off next week so stay tuned!

Source

Muevo crowdfunding page

The post IA Crowdfunding Campaign launching soon! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “IA PARTY A GOGO 2017” Fan Screening in Switzerland!
item.dc:creator: Cinzya
item.description:
Those who follow VocalNexus, and Aki No Matsuri on Facebook or Discord should know this already: IA will finally make a stop in Switzerland! The Swiss convention Aki No Matsuri, which already hosted VOCAMERICA two years ago, welcomes IA (Aria on the Planets) in cooperation with VocalNexus this year on the weekend of August 31th …

The post “IA PARTY A GOGO 2017” Fan Screening in Switzerland! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Those who follow VocalNexus, and Aki No Matsuri on Facebook or Discord should know this already: IA will finally make a stop in Switzerland! The Swiss convention Aki No Matsuri, which already hosted VOCAMERICA two years ago, welcomes IA (Aria on the Planets) in cooperation with VocalNexus this year on the weekend of August 31th to September 1st.

 

IA (Aria on the Planets), der digitale Superstar aus Japan, begeistert auf der ganzen Welt Millionen von Fans mit ihren…

Posted by Aki no Matsuri on Sunday, August 11, 2019

 

With the permission of 1st Place, VocalNexus will bring “IA-PARTY A GOGO! 2017” to the screen in the cinema hall of the multi-purpose complex Teuchelweiher in Winterthur, Switzerland on both Saturday and Sunday. Details of the performance will be announced on-site by the Aki No Matsuri.

But there is more! Everyone will get the chance to receive a small gift by answering IA’s survey at the VocalNexus booth.

Unfortunately IA’s merchandise, which has been sold at other conventions in the past, will not be available this time.

Tickets

You can buy tickets for the convention at Ticketino you can check on their prices below.

Golden Weekend Con Package: 157.95 SFr (about 163 USD)
Weekend Con Package: 79.80 SFr (about 83 USD)
Weekend Ticket: 53.75 SFr (about 56 USD)
Saturday Ticket: 32.55 SFr  (about 34 USD)
Sunday Ticket: 32.55 SFr (about 34 USD)

Details can be found on the official page of Aki No Matsuri (German only) as well.

Accommodation plan (ticket not included)

Those who arrive from outside the country will even have the opportunity to book an overnight stay in addition to their ticket! You can find the price list below.

Sat/Sun single room: 43.00 SFr (about 45 USD)
Sat/Sun room for 2 persons (price per person): 43.00 SFr (about 45 USD)
Sat/Sun room for 4 persons (price per person): 32.55 SFr (about 34 USD)
Sat/Sun room for 8 persons (price per person): 27.15 SFr (about 28 USD)
Sat/Sun room for 12 persons (price per person): 27.15 SFr (about 28 USD)

Breakfast (price per person): 14.10 SFr (about 15 USD)

Opening hours

Saturday: 10AM ~ 6PM (CEST)
Sunday: 9AM ~ 5PM (CEST)

Follow VocalNexus and Aki No Matsuri on social media to stay up to date. We at VNN will also report to you as soon as there is something new!

Sources

Aki No Matsuri Official Website
Aki No Matsuri Official Facebook
VocalNexus Official Website
VocalNexus Official Facebook
VocalNexus Official Twitter
IA World Page

The post “IA PARTY A GOGO 2017” Fan Screening in Switzerland! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA & ONE New Performances, Official Twitter Account and More!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hello ARIAers! Seems today is your lucky one, as the two ARIA sisters from 1st Place, IA and ONE, finally got more performances planned and even their own official account on Twitter! New Events Seems IA and ONE will be back with their most iconic liv performances once more very soon! The duo will come …

The post IA & ONE New Performances, Official Twitter Account and More! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello ARIAers! Seems today is your lucky one, as the two ARIA sisters from 1st Place, IA and ONE, finally got more performances planned and even their own official account on Twitter!

New Events

Seems IA and ONE will be back with their most iconic liv performances once more very soon! The duo will come back on November 30th at DMM VR THEATER YOKOHAMA with two different shows!

Hey ARIAers! So many news today! Are you ready!?!?? Here we go!Make sure to read all the post, surprise at the end!<…

Posted by IA　World Page on Thursday, August 1, 2019

That’s right! Two new performances got announced and will both be held on November 30th in two different locations!

  • “ARIA –IA MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW–Encore Performance”
    Date and Time: November 30th, 2019. Doors open at 4:30PM, while the show starts at 5:30PM (JST)
    Tickets: S Seats cost 9,990 JPY and include limited edition goods, while A Seats are priced 6,990 JPY. You can also get a drink for 500 JPY!
  • “IA’s “PARTY A GO-GO” Super EDITION”
    Date and Time: November 30th, 2019. Doors open at 12:30PM, while the show starts at 1PM (JST)
    Tickets: S Seats cost 7,990 JPY and include limited edition goods, while A Seats are priced 4,990 JPY. You can also get a drink for 500 JPY!

Tickets’ pre-sale will begin on August 8th until 18th via eplus raffle, with the payment period being accepted starting August 21th until 26th of the same month!

If you are interested keep an eye on IA’s eplus page by clicking here!

Note that you can purchase up to 4 tickets only!

More and More Social!

The ARIA duo loves connecting to their fans, we knew that already considering their happiness everytime they get to have some time for them, so it shouldn’t surprise us at all t see the two sisters opening their own Twitter account!

バーチャルアーティストIAとONEの公式アカウントです！IAとONEの最新情報はもちろん、IA・ONE・運営スタッフのつぶやきをお届けします！ぜひ、フォローよろしくお願いします！#IA #ONE #ARIAer pic.twitter.com/IgfczUnCqz

— IA&ONE公式 (@IA_ONE_Official) August 1, 2019

From now on, IA and ONE will share their own official news as well, often commenting them from their own point of view! Isn’t it exciting?

初めまして、1st PLACEスタッフです！ぜひ応援頂けたら嬉しいです。アカウント開設に寄せ、2人のコメントをお届けします！

「オネやスタッフさんに教わりながら、沢山呟けたらなと思います。よろしくお願いします！ IA」

「実は会社アカでツイートしたことあるんです。こっちでも頑張ります！ ONE」 pic.twitter.com/ofmp3lCZqh

— IA&ONE公式 (@IA_ONE_Official) August 1, 2019

Follow those little cuties on Twitter by clicking here! You will absolutely love their company, trust us!

Watch IA Performing “HIGHER” on Youtube!

Last but not least, they uploaded IA’s live performance of her English song “HIGHER” on Youtube!

That’s not the only news! Alongside HIGHER’s video they also released the motion data used for it and can now get loaded on MikuMikuDance with any character model you want!

You can download it here! Don’t forget to check its readme file before using it!

Sources

Don’t forget to follow us on VNN for more, amazing news from the ARIA sisters and many more virtual singers!

1st PLACE can be found on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Soundcloud, Youtube and has a website
IA has a global Facebook page and a Bilibili channel
Don’t forget IA and ONE also have a Twitter account now!
Hachimaki is Facebook (English) and on Twitter (English/Japanese)
Hachimaki Goods Shop (Europe/Japanese)

The post IA & ONE New Performances, Official Twitter Account and More! appeared first on VNN.
